title: Wish Again: Dream's Truth
description: Wish Again: Dream's Truth - The Unicorns of Wish #2 www.unicornkisses.comSuitable reading age - 10-14 (Middle Grade to Young Teen Chapter Books) In Paperback and eBooks.An age-old legend comes to life...In a bold race to save Wish and the outside world, who should Rielle trust: the ancient First One with his fickle moods and romping outbursts, or the secretive boy, Willful James?Destiny once more collides with Rielle, her band of loyal friends and the unicorns as they are swept powerfully into a journey that will change them all forever.
author: Deby Adair
